snippet: OLBERT--Anny (Eitingon). On March 8th, 2016, of congestive heart failure. Beloved wife of Victor, loving mother to Dominique, and adoring grandmother to Galadriel and Aimee. Her elegance, generosity, and love of family will be missed. May she be at peace. A memorial service will be held at Westchester Hills Cemetery, 400 Saw Mill River Road, Hastings On Hudson, NY, on Sunday, March 20th, at 11:00am. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to Doctors Without Borders, 333 Seventh Avenue, New York, N.Y. 10001-5004. 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLBERT--Anny (Eitingon). On March 8th, 2016, of congestive heart failure. Beloved wife of Victor, loving mother to Dominique, and adoring grandmother to Galadriel and Aimee. Her elegance, generosity, and love of family will be missed. May she be at peace. A memorial service will be held at Westchester Hills Cemetery, 400 Saw Mill River Road, Hastings On Hudson, NY, on Sunday, March 20th, at 11:00am. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to Doctors Without Borders, 333 Seventh Avenue, New York, N.Y. 10001-5004. 1/3
